protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Photoreceptor required for image-forming vision at low light intensity. Required for photoreceptor cell viability after birth. Light-induced isomerization of 11-cis to all-trans retinal triggers a conformational change leading to G-protein activation and release of all-trans retinal

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
